title: Prof. Mcfly
description: Read Chapter 10: Hoverboard Basics and prepare for the quiz at the beginning of class. Also, turn in your Hoverboard designs and prototype for mid-term grades. For extra credit you can also submit your Delorean  blueprints if ready.

title: Prof. Schrute
description: Read Chapter 6: Beet Farm Techniques and prepare for the quiz at the beginning of class. Also, turn in your Website Templates for Schrute Farms for mid-term grades. For extra credit be sure to include the rich history of beet farming.
